meanings.definition: A scientist who studies the origin and development of the universe.
meanings.sent1: Cosmologists explore how the universe began.
meanings.sent2: The cosmologists gathered to discuss the Big Bang theory.
meanings.sent3: The cosmologists joked that the universe must have had a really big birthday party.
meanings.sent4: In the vast library of the cosmos, cosmologists are the diligent readers.
meanings.sent5: The work of cosmologists unveils the secrets of the universe's birth.

meanings.definition: The group of scientists who study the universe as a whole.
meanings.sent1: Cosmologists work together to understand the entire universe.
meanings.sent2: The cosmologists collaborated on a project to map out galaxies.
meanings.sent3: At the cosmic picnic, the cosmologists brought telescopes instead of sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The universe is a grand puzzle, and cosmologists are the keen solvers.
meanings.sent5: The cosmologists' mission is to grasp the vastness of the cosmos.
